about_the_game:
This game is about finding randomly appearing objects on the map. When the game starts, you will be able to see the view that the object is looking at, and you should try to get as much information as possible to get a better advantage. If you can't locate the object, try to find it in the security room. In the security room, you can still see the video from the surveillance camera, and it will be the last piece of information you need.

Operating Instructions
Press the H key to receive a hint, but the hint can only be used in certain places. You can only use it 3 times and it will not blind you and you will receive more information.

Press the G key to find the initial location.

The E key is used to clear the object of the correct answer.

Press ESC or P key to open options.

Game Instructions
The viewpoints of randomly generated objects are shared, but they are blinded.

Move around the map and look for the same point of view as the first one you saw.

You can also choose to look for clues, there are a total of three places where you can receive clues.

When you reach a place you are sure of, press E to confirm.

Video Distribution Guidelines
All individuals and corporations are allowed to distribute videos without permission.
Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.
You may use PV for your videos and distribution.

We will not be liable for any damage caused by the distribution of this game video.
We are not responsible for any damages caused by the distribution of this game.
The contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.

name: Looking for Something

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10 windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10 windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The objective of the game is to find what you are looking for, which appears randomly on the map. Please get a hint and proceed through the map relying on that information, or else you may get a hint, which you can use to recommend the game to your advantage.
